item.description:
•VegWorcester General Interest Meeting


•This will be our 4th monthly general mtg for members, volunteers, and those curious to find out what VegWorcester is all about -

• We'll do a go-around and get to know each other, talk about how our September festival tabling/leafleting went, talk about upcoming fall university/ campus outreach & college leafleting, as well as ways to get involved this fall/winter. We'll have some campus leafleting dates volunteers can sign up for if they want to help out.

•We'll also do a small casual vegan potluck if anyone wants to bring something- all ingredients should be vegan (no meat, milk, dairy, eggs, gelatin, etc) Don't worry if you can't bring anything, just feel free to show up!

There is also a Facebook Event for this: https://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=2560...

For more info:

  • manda@vegworcester.com
  • http://www.vegworcester.com    
  • http://www.facebook.com/vegworcester
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in Atwood 301, on the 3rd floor..which is above the big theatre building. (Campus Map: http://www.clarku.edu/campusmap)
item.name: VegWorcester September General Meeting
